02141                                         &ptr, &size);
02142                 if (i == 0) {
02143                     if (ptimestamp != NULL) {
02144                         *ptimestamp = ccn_charbuf_create();
02145                         ccn_charbuf_append(*ptimestamp, ptr, size);
02146                     }
02147                     needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_TIMESTAMP;
02148                 }
02149             }
02150             ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Type, 1, -1);
02151             i = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
02152                     CCN_DTAG_FreshnessSeconds);
02153             if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS) != 0 && i >= 0) {
02154                 result->freshness = i;
02155                 needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_FRESHNESS;
02156             }
02157             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_FinalBlockID)) {
02158                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
02159                 start = d->decoder.token_index;
02160                 if (ccn_buf_match_some_blob(d))
02161                     ccn_buf_advance(d);
02162                 stop = d->decoder.token_index;
02163                 ccn_buf_check_close(d);
02164                 if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID) != 0 && 
02165                     d->decoder.state >= 0 && stop > start) {
02166                     if (pfinalblockid != NULL) {
02167                         *pfinalblockid = ccn_charbuf_create();
02168                         ccn_charbuf_append(*pfinalblockid,
02169                                            d->buf + start, stop - start);
02170                     }
02171                     needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_FINAL_BLOCK_ID;
02172                 }
02173             }
02174             start = d->decoder.token_index;
02175             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator))
02176                 ccn_buf_advance_past_element(d);
02177             stop = d->decoder.token_index;
02178             if ((needed & CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR) != 0 && 
02179                 d->decoder.state >= 0 && stop > start) {
02180                 if (pkeylocator != NULL) {
02181                     *pkeylocator = ccn_charbuf_create();
02182                     ccn_charbuf_append(*pkeylocator,
02183                                        d->buf + start, stop - start);
02184                 }
02185                 needed &= ~CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR;
02186             }
02187             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
02188         }
02189         if (d->decoder.state < 0)
02190             res = NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL);
02191     }
02192     if (needed != 0)
02193         res = NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL);
02194     return(res);
02195 }
02196 
02197 /**
02198  * Create a signed ContentObject.
02199  *
02200  * @param h is the ccn handle
02201  * @param resultbuf - result buffer to which the ContentObject will be appended
02202  * @param name_prefix contains the ccnb-encoded name
02203  * @param params describe the ancillary information needed
02204  * @param data points to the raw content
02205  * @param size is the size of the raw content, in bytes
02206  * @returns 0 for success, -1 for error
02207  */
02208 int
02209 ccn_sign_content(struct ccn *h,
02210                  struct ccn_charbuf *resultbuf,
02211                  const struct ccn_charbuf *name_prefix,
02212                  const struct ccn_signing_params *params,
02213                  const void *data, size_t size)
02214 {
02215     struct hashtb_enumerator ee;
02216     struct hashtb_enumerator *e = &ee;
02217     struct ccn_signing_params p = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
02218     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
02219     struct ccn_keystore *keystore = NULL;
02220     struct ccn_charbuf *timestamp = NULL;
02221     struct ccn_charbuf *finalblockid = NULL;
02222     struct ccn_charbuf *keylocator = NULL;
02223     int res;
02224     
02225     res = ccn_chk_signing_params(h, params, &p,
02226                                  &timestamp, &finalblockid, &keylocator);
02227     if (res < 0)
02228         return(res);
02229     hashtb_start(h->keystores, e);
02230     if (hashtb_seek(e, p.pubid, sizeof(p.pubid), 0) == HT_OLD_ENTRY) {
02231         struct ccn_keystore **pk = e->data;
02232         keystore = *pk;
02233         signed_info = ccn_charbuf_create();
02234         if (keylocator == NULL && (p.sp_flags & CCN_SP_OMIT_KEY_LOCATOR) == 0) {
02235             /* Construct a key locator containing the key itself */
02236             keylocator = ccn_charbuf_create();
02237             ccn_charbuf_append_tt(keylocator, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator, CCN_DTAG);
02238             ccn_charbuf_append_tt(keylocator, CCN_DTAG_Key, CCN_DTAG);
02239             res = ccn_append_pubkey_blob(keylocator,
02240                                          ccn_keystore_public_key(keystore));
02241             ccn_charbuf_append_closer(keylocator); /* </Key> */
02242             ccn_charbuf_append_closer(keylocator); /* </KeyLocator> */
02243         }
02244         if (res >= 0 && (p.sp_flags & CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK) != 0) {
02245             int ncomp;
02246             struct ccn_indexbuf *ndx;
02247             const unsigned char *comp = NULL;
02248             size_t size = 0;
02249             
02250             ndx = ccn_indexbuf_create();
02251             ncomp = ccn_name_split(name_prefix, ndx);
02252             if (ncomp < 0)
02253                 res = NOTE_ERR(h, EINVAL);
02254             else {
02255                 finalblockid = ccn_charbuf_create();
02256                 ccn_name_comp_get(name_prefix->buf,
02257                                   ndx, ncomp - 1, &comp, &size);
02258                 ccn_charbuf_append_tt(finalblockid, size, CCN_BLOB);
02259                 ccn_charbuf_append(finalblockid, comp, size);
02260             }
02261             ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ndx);
02262         }
02263         if (res >= 0)
02264             res = ccn_signed_info_create(signed_info,
02265                                          ccn_keystore_public_key_digest(keystore),
02266                                          ccn_keystore_public_key_digest_length(keystore),
02267                                          timestamp,
02268                                          p.type,
02269                                          p.freshness,
02270                                          finalblockid,
02271                                          keylocator);
02272         if (res >= 0)
02273             res = ccn_encode_ContentObject(resultbuf,
02274                                            name_prefix,
02275                                            signed_info,
02276                                            data,
02277                                            size,
02278                                            NULL, // XXX
02279                                            ccn_keystore_private_key(keystore));
02280     }
02281     else {
02282         res = NOTE_ERR(h, -1);
02283         hashtb_delete(e);
02284     }
02285     hashtb_end(e);
02286     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&timestamp);
02287     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keylocator);
02288     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&finalblockid);
02289     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
02290     return(res);
02291 }
